extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the official Dublin Bus Android App. This first version has Real Time Information available for all 5,000 bus stops in the Dublin Bus network as well as a Route Planner, Timetables and News section.What is Real Time Information?Real Time Information will show you when your bus is due to arrive at your bus stop so you can plan your journey more accurately.You can search for your bus stop in a number of ways:Search By Bus Stop Number â just enter any bus stop number and see the nearest buses in the next hourSave Favourites â save your most frequently used bus stops and quickly find the nearest buses to your stopSearch by Bus Route â if you want to search for bus stop on your by Bus Route, simply enter the number of the route you require. You can also see a map showing bus stops along the route.Search By Address - If you donât know your bus stop number yet, you can search by entering a street addressSearch by stop near to your current location â use the map to find bus stops near to your current location. You can pan and zoom in to see more.We are still working on some known issues but please report any bugs and feedback to dbonline@dublinbus.ie

reviews.comment: Could be a whole lot better,says it\'s passed one stop but yet 3 mins until it\'s at the next one and not a bus to be seen passing by? Simple logic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This is a very easy to use app, with lots of super little features. Real time info can be a little off in heavy traffic though.
reviews.author: Eoin McGlynn

reviews.title: Decent but that\'s it
reviews.comment: Does the job when it works. But why does it have to download all the routes/stops when you are searching for one! Can you not just enter the route and it will find just the stops for that route. The time table finder is iffy at best.
reviews.author: Richie Stroughair

reviews.title: Great BUT
reviews.comment: Great app. However I cannot see difference in graphics or cannot name favorites. Also when I downloaded it did not remove there old one. Now have two apps and can\'t remove one. Fix and you are 5
reviews.author: Tom Slattery

reviews.title: Handy App
reviews.comment: Finding the bus stops and routes is more faster, you don\'t have to guess. It could do with a home screen widget and an Andriod 4.1 UI.
reviews.author: Ngury Mangueira

reviews.title: Good when it works.
reviews.comment: When it works, it\'s pretty good.  HOWEVER it very regularly stops working and you get the \"Realtime information not available for this stop\" message for every stop you try, or upcoming buses regularly disappear and occasionally reappear 20 minutes later, and of couse there are stops where the route has changed and the bus no longer passes them, but the app still predicts that the old bus is coming.  That\'s a lot of fun on a rainy day.
reviews.author: Sarah B

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Absolutely shite.. won\'t even load routes stops or busses now. Just like their bus service, SHITE!
reviews.author: Patrick Flynn

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Just amazing everything you need,b makes using Dublin bus a whole lot better
reviews.author: HUGH O\'BRIEN

reviews.title: Obviously don\'t listen
reviews.comment: Quite amazing that instead of working on a sensible app db is getting rid off bad ratings, critical comments, and good suggestions by releasing the app new each time instead of using their customers ideas to db\'s advantage. It must be great sitting on ones hands all day and still getting paid-sad.
reviews.author: David L

reviews.title: This app hasnt been thought through
reviews.comment: Very bad, not optimized for 3g use, which should be the main focus of this app. If you dont have a perfect connection, forget about getting real time info based on your stop number... Completely redundant
reviews.author: Michael Zuke

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Works fine for me but I think it would be good if you added cash fare prices as well
reviews.author: Carlos Merriman

reviews.title: Good but Very Unreliable
reviews.comment: Wheb it works, it works really well. however on many occasions it has let me down. Sometimes a bus arrives 10mins earlier. Or u are waiting for 10 mins even though the app states its due in 2mins. Frustration.
reviews.author: Paul MacReamoinn

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Tried using the map function and it Completely froze my galaxy S2 I had to reboot. Terrible interface. Badly designed.
reviews.author: Fergal Monahan

reviews.title: Useless.- like their service
reviews.comment: Package invalid message on a Sony experia j
reviews.author: Tom Fuller

reviews.title: If you don\'t know the route number
reviews.comment: It will be very hard for you to find the correct bus. This app is useful when you know the route number and want to find its stops, timing, etc. If you don\'t, it\'s a trial and error clicking a map until you find an appropriate route. It should have an option to tell the app: I\'m going to this point, and then it tells you the possible routes based on your location.
reviews.author: Danny Herran

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: This is crab why don\'t they make it so you search your stop and it tells you the nearest bus with the time remaining.
reviews.author: Conor O\'Carroll

reviews.title: Handy app
reviews.comment: Works well so far HTC one
reviews.author: John Mannion

reviews.title: No timetables
reviews.comment: Useful app but not when it doesn\'t work, please fix.
reviews.author: Darren \303\223 hUiginn

reviews.title: Needs more updates !
reviews.comment: Problems and boring display !!!
reviews.author: Sean Brady

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Not a great app. Take too long to load up when activated. The non official app is better and quicker. Money wasted by Dublin Bus again.
reviews.author: Karl Paul
